name: Rise Of The Wool Ball
summary: Rise of the Wool Ball is a 2017 total conversion for the ZDoom engine. It was made by MSPaintR0cks and is the sequel to Shadow of the Wool Ball. The game is spread across three episodes, each having five levels with a secret level. Like its predecessor, Rise of the Wool Ball uses a cartoon art style, and it was named a runner-up at the Cacowards that year.
